seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed for reproducible results. Leave blank for random seed.

steps.title: Steps
steps.description: Number of diffusion steps (higher = better quality but slower)

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Text prompt describing the desired audio

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of generated audio in seconds

cfg_scale.title: Cfg Scale
cfg_scale.description: Classifier-free guidance scale (higher = more prompt adherence)
